shortdesc.ph: Callback triggered when the local music file finishes playing.
Callback for when local music file playback ends.

dlentry.dd: This method is deprecated. Use instead.
This method is deprecated. Use instead.

section.p: This callback is triggered when the local music file finishes playing after calling startAudioMixing. If the call to startAudioMixing fails, it returns the error code WARN_AUDIO_MIXING_OPEN_ERROR.
After calling startAudioMixing to play a local music file, this callback is triggered when playback ends. If startAudioMixing fails, it returns the error code WARN_AUDIO_MIXING_OPEN_ERROR.

section.title: Trigger Timing
section.p: Triggered when the local music file finishes playing after calling startAudioMixing.
This callback is triggered when the local music file playback ends.
